This is the same man who stated several months after Desert Storm that his goal was to "make the world scared to death of the United States." Re: Six Years Later: March 19- Shock

spearheaded by U.S. Senator Robert Menendez ( D-NJ), a member of the Foreign Relations Committee, and joined by Senators Frank Lautenberg ( D-NJ), Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-NY) and Charles Ellis Schumer ( D-NY). Senator Robert Menendez said: The UK didn't just turn a blind eye to Abdelbaset al-Megrahi 's release- they cut deals that set the terrorist free. The UK and Scottish governments' repeated denials, even when confronted by specific and compelling evidence, get more ludicrous by the day. It is time that these governments launch independent investigations into the matter and put the wheels in motion to return Abdelbaset al-Megrahi to prison. Senator Frank Lautenberg said, "More than a year after his release, Abdelbaset al-Megrahi remains Abdelbaset al-Megrahive while the authorities who set him free continue to dodge responsibility. She added: Larry Page and Sergey Brin have grown up. They want to run their own company.
